post.body: yeah, I'm in Auckland myself. If we had to be at the bottom of the world, hey, at least we're first to see the new year :)
sounds great. where's that?
that's exactly what i meant :) i can't comprehend it much but i <3 it regardless
Spent 2day at Rainbows End (NZ's "premiere adventure park") with the family unit. F's thoughts on the Pirate Ship: http://snipurl.com/9bq1a
January first, twenty oh nine. Has a nice ring to it. Happy new year New Zealand, and to the rest of y'all in good time!
Moving about 100gb of filez from old Mac to new Mac over wifi. Finder estimates 12 hours just for the first 27gb! Oh Mac OS pls be joking
I think it's safe to say that whomsoever invents a marker that puts it's own lid back on will forever be a hero to parents everywhere.
Ooops. Right in the path of the thermal exhaust on a Macbook Pro is NOT the optimal storage location for a packet of Tim Tams.
Felicity has decided that Mario (as in, Mario Kart) is her boyfriend. She says he's "gorgeous". She's currently dancing to his theme tune.
Just checked to see if pic.cx is available; it isn't. But what IS there is totally off the hook.
Here's what the corner of our lounge looks like in xmas mode... http://snipurl.com/95p86
Went to Bond n Bond for an SD card - $59.95 for 1gb. Wtf!? Maybe if it were 2002. K-mart on the other hand - $9.95, that's more like it.
That would be THIS shirt. http://snipurl.com/90svz
Every time I wear this shirt to work, I get people asking me if I'm a communist...
Bitter, Sweet, Salty, Sour have been documented for 2400 years. A fifth flavor, Umami ("Savory"), is also now recognised by science #factlet
Yum... chai... for .... lunch.... i.... can't.... move.
Apple, please bring out a one-piece Bluetooth keyboard/trackpad thingie when you refresh the iMac. Don't make me go back to using a mouse!!
As at July 2008, the rate of inflation in Zimbabwe is 231,000,000%. #factlet
This bus is moving veeeery slowly. Still, gives me a chance to read some of the Chomsky book I got today for someones Xmas pressie...
Do I really want a cup of coffee, or am I just looking for an excuse to eat a cookie? Hard to tell.
